Translations.Text: Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Amuddir, Imezgi
Issers ak d Tazmamt s tidep, d atebbet n wayen ip id izwaren. Issers ed Tuoa akked Linoil
uqbel, d nnhaya i medden. Issers ed Leqwoan. Ih, wid inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi, fellasen aaaqeb uquie. Oebbi d Uzmir, Ippara d ppao
Ih, Oebbi ur aS iffir wacemma di tmurt, ne$ deg igenni
D Neppa i wen Ippaken udem, di taabbav, akken i S ihwa. Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab

Neppa i k ed Issersen Tazmamt, degs issekniyen uvhioen, nitni d tayimmap n Tezmamt. Wiyav d licwao. D$a, wid iwumi mmalen wulawen, teddun akked wayen illan d licwao, ssaramen ahewwel, ssaramen asefhem is. I Issnen asefhem is, siwa Oebbi. Qqaoen imawlan n tmusni: "numen yis. S$uo Mass nne$ akw". Id ismektayen, siwa uaqilen
A Mass nne$! Ur Smili ulawen nne$, mbaad ma Tenhiv a$. Efk a$ d, s$uoeK, aeunu. Ih, Kecc, ard Am$it
A Mass nne$! Kecc, s tidep, ara Ijemmlen medden, ass i$ef ur illi ccekk. S tidep, Oebbi ur Izeggel lemaahda
